mapinfo.detailsText:
Players face each other on the opposite sides of a water course.
 Take control of the river shallows to deny the passage to the opponent and ensure additional resources for your own.
 The river freezes in winter leaving your base less protected.
 
 Native Civs: None 
 Mercenaries: Wokou Horseman / Wokou Ronin 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
